2017 wasare gewi giya masa dahayaka kalaya awasanaye rajya prathamika mulya sheshaya rupiyal biliyana 21.9 k lesa dakweyi. 2016 wasare mul masa dahaya awasanaye ema agaya dak wuye rupiyal biliyana 37 ka runa agayak lesaya.
aththenma owuhu dan adhyapanaya, thakshanaya ha pawul wyuhaya sambandha samaja nawinathwaya wani samajiya wenaskam piliganithi.

prawahana amathi kumara welgama saha khanija thel sanwardhana amathya susil premajayantha yana mahathwarun saha ema amathyansha niladharinge sahabhagithwayen eeye (24 da) kolambaadi pawathi prawruththi sakachchawakadi me bawa danum denu labiya. 2005 wasara wana wita khanija thel prawahanayen 75% k sidu kerenuye dumriya magin wuwath eya me wana wita 35% k dakwa aduwi atha.
kalawe yedenna oona nirawul manasakin.
